Key:
Ahh, I'm so full! Your food is always great,
Shido!
Of course. Thank you.

Shido, I'm going to gather everyone together
later. Let's meet up and exchange the information
we've picked up.
Got it. I'll head over once I finish cleaning.

...So, with all that said, a full day has passed.
Did you guys notice anything about this world?
Yeah!
(Tohka's hand shot up.)
Yes, Tohka. What is it?

It's not much different from the real world!
Shido's bento and dinner were both good!
Yeah. Right.

However, there was a dream-like thing after
school. I was a teacher and Shido was sick.

I was a really cool teacher, but... something
embarrassing happened...
I'm not sure I'm following...

Uh... so that dream-like state... It seems like
Arusu was making it happen. She wanted to observe
love in an unusual situation.

I understand. So it was like an event, was it?
Observe love in an unusual situation...
I see, so an unusual date.

Arusu is in control of this world... I guess we
can assume she's the manager.

I don't know if it's something we can use in this
world, but should I try my Gabriel on her?

Let's not. If it's as I'm assuming, although she's
an AI, she is still a Spirit.

To top it off, the world we are in is completely
controlled by the opponent. If we mess with her,
God knows what'll happen.

Right. I think that's a wise decision, Flame
Spirit-san.

Why does that rub me the wrong way, coming from
you?

It's not the time to be complaining about that.
So from tomorrow onward, let's continue to observe
this world and continue to investigate Arusu.
Right, I guess that's all we can do now.

Okay. That's it, guys. Don't let your guard down,
okay?
Man, today was a long one. So much has happened...

*Sigh*... The night wind feels good.
Not to mention—
...Shido Itsuka. What are you doing?

Arusu. Oh, I was just getting some fresh air.
Oh... and watching the stars...

Stars... So you were observing the hot, gaseous
bodies that exist in the known universe.

Well I guess I was, but not in that way... I was
just thinking that the stars look beautiful,
even in this world.
Beautiful, you say? I do not understand.

Oh, right... You see, just look up... Do you still
not understand?
They are... shining...
Right.
There are some bright stars, and some are not.

You're right. The bright stars and the glimmering
ones are big. Some are closer than others.

And there are also Mars and Jupiter and other
planets near Earth.

Yes. I know the names of the planetary bodies.
I know all facts set up in this system.

Oh, that's right... Egg on my face, as if I know
it all.
Hm?

I do not know if this is beautiful,
but it's kind of...
Interesting?

...I don't know. It's an odd... feeling I do not
know. But... I don't mind it.
I see. Then that's good.
Shido Itsuka... You know so many strange things.

I don't know about that, Arusu. You definitely
have more knowledge. This world... a world similar
to the real one... you know everything about it.
But... There are many things I don't know.
I don't know a lot of things, either.
But Shido Itsuka, you should know what love is.
Me? Know love?

That is the reason why... I want to learn love
from you.
So... please.

I have a purpose. But it won't be fulfilled unless
I receive your cooperation.
So... Please. Please teach me... love.

Please...? I'm flattered that you feel like you
can depend on me. I'll try to do what I can do.
...Please.

Okay... I don't know if I can, but I'll try
to help you find that answer.
...Okay.
And one more thing...
Hm?
...Um, thank you.
Huh?
You said... that you'd help me...

Haha. I don't know if I can really find it,
though. But I'll try my best.
